favourite.article: I totally enjoy singing this hymn and believe every word in it.

The best part about being saved is that I don't have to go to church and be saved, or do works to obtain my salvation. Eph. 2:8 For by grace you have been saved through faith, and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God, 9 not of works, lest anyone should boast.
I like to listen to the hymn because it is about God.
A beautiful God-man Jesus Christ! He is God's way of salvation. Believe and you will be saved! It pleases God to rescue us out of this present evil age. Amen. Thank You Lord.

** A life in Christ is a life that is free from the bondage of sin and the vanity of this age. A life that is back to God's original intent and purpose of creating man..
** A life in Christ is a life that is filled with Christ as our joy and peace within daily, even moment by moment. A life that is the mingling of God in Christ as the Spirit with us constantly and eternally.
** A life in Christ is a life that is free from the present religious evil age. A life that has Christ as the center, reality and content, and has nothing of religion, falsehood and vanity.
** A life in Christ is a life that knows and sees Christ as the most excellent and beautiful Person in the whole universe. A life that has Christ revealed in us for our appreciation and realization of His all-inclusive, super-excellent and preeminent Person and work in God's economy.
** A life in Christ is a life that is filled with Christ as the Spirit to be our enjoyment, experience and possession. A life that is dependent on Christ as our life and life supply through our organic union with Him in His death and resurrection, that is our faith in the Son of God.
** A life in Christ is a life that is effortless and spontaneous, for it is not I but the grace of Christ, which energizes and empowers us daily. A life of being many sons of the living God that daily receives Christ as grace to be our everything from our God the Father as the source.
** A life in Christ is a life that allows Christ as our life to grow in us daily unto maturity for the preparation of His bride. A life that allows Christ to saturate, permeate and soak our entire being daily and continually that He may be formed in us.
** A life in Christ is a life that lives, expresses and magnifies Christ by living and walking by the Spirit. A life that takes Christ as our life and person for the manifestation and glorification of God in the flesh.
** A life in Christ is a life that is one with Christ in His life, nature, expression and function. A life that fulfills His heart's desire and purpose by being blended and built up with other believers to be His built-up Body now and His coming bride at His second coming..
** A life in Christ is a life that lives and works out the New Jerusalem, the holy city as God's ultimate goal in this present age for the fulfillment of God's heart's desire and the accomplishment of His eternal purpose. A life that is on the highest plane by fulfilling and accomplishing God's original intention and will in His creation of man with the universe.
Oh, What A Life!
